alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. John The Baptist, southeastern St. Helena, eastern Livingston and Tangipahoa Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 333 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Livingston to 6 miles north of Garyville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Ponchatoula, Amite City, Livingston, Independence, Roseland, Albany, Springfield, Wilmer, Natalbany, Robert, Killian and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 25 and 51. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 18 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. Helena; St. John The Baptist
